objective: Seeking a position as Senior Angular Java EE developer , where 17 years Full Stack large scale multi-clients enterprise application developm ent experience will contribute.

summary.content: 17 years Java EE Full Stack applications development experience for Banking, Ministry and Telecom, working through exposure to Full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
8 years hands on Angular 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 development experience with Bootstrap, Angular Material, HTML5, Typescript, CSS 3/CSS4 /SCSS, and NodeJS.
17 years hands-on experience with Tomcat, SpringBoot, Spring Cloud, BEA WebLogic and IBM WebSphere application servers, AWS, Azure, Heroku Cloud servers.

17 years Web Service development experience with in-depth proficiency of SOAP, WSDL, XML and messaging. 10 years’ experience using Restful API web service with JSON data structure and Micro services with spring boot.
8 years DevOs and CI Continuous Integration experience with Hudson / Jenkins, Heroku, AWS.
Excellent team player with strong verbal and written communication skills. Quick learner and ready to learn and work on new technologies.

tech.content: Angular: Angular 1 , 2 , 4 , 5 , 6, 7, 8(7yrs),  Angular Material Design(5yr), TypeScirpt(6yr), Angular-CLI(6yrs), Lodash(2yrs), Ajax(4yrs), CSS3/ CSS4/SCSS(10yrs), JavaScript(12yrs), NodeJs (7yr), StrongLoop(2yr), Bootstrap(6yrs), NPM(7yr), Bower(1yr), Karma(1yr), Jasmine(5yr), JSON(16yrs), HTML5(7yrs), Junit(10yrs)

Java Enterprise: Java/J2EE(17yrs), XML(16yrs), EJB(10yrs), Web-Service (17yrs), Spring Framework (15yrs), SQL(10yrs), SOAP (10yrs), MQ(3yrs), Struts (10yrs), Servlet (10yrs), JSP(10yrs), JSF(8yrs),  JDBC(12yrs),  UNIX(8yrs),  iBATIS(2yrs), Mongo DB(3yrs)
IDE: Eclipse, JBuilder-X Enterprise, RAD. JDK 1.4/1.5/1.6/1.7/1.8, WebStrom, Sublime, VSCODE.
Application Server: BEA WebLogic (8.1 / 9.2 / 10.3), IBM WebSphere (6.0 / 7.0 / 8.5), Tomcat 5/6/7, AWS, Azure
Database: Oracle (9i / 10g / 11g), MXSQL, Tandem / Non-stop DB, DB2, MongoDB, Cassandra DB, SQL.
TOOLS: Rational Rose, XML Spy, ANT, Maven, CVS, MKS Integrity, SVN, SCM, Git, Stash, Clear Case, Postman, SonarQube, Jmeter, JIRA, Grunt, Agile, AWS, kubernetes Cloud
DevOS and CI Continuous Integration: Hudson / Jenkins, AWS, Heroku

edu.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science in Brock University Canada

projects.techuse: Technology used: (Angular 7, Angular Material, HTML5, SCSS, Restful services, Java EE, Spring framework, GIT)
projects.projectdesc: MBNA Credit Card project is large scale web-based online application for user apply MBNA credit card.

responsibility.content: (Front-end) Designed and built structures using Angular CLI, Angular Material framework.
(Front-end) Implemented new Angular 7 components, child components, services, Angular reactive forms and SCSS classes UIs based on VDS business requirement and bootstrap.
(Front-end) Created Angular 7 Observable services layer and modals subscribe and exchange data from back-end Restful APIs.

(Back-end) Implemented back-end Restful APIs GET, POST and PUT APIs. Created Restful controller and endpoints with JSON data structures requests and responses with Micro-services using Java, Maven, Spring framework.
(Back-end) Created back-end service layers, models and implemented Circuit Breaker and Aggregator patterns, validation rules and DTO layers, SQL queries exchange data with Oracle database.

(Security) Implemented HTTP SSL web service handshakes and session less JWT token generation based on public and private keys for Restful services and encrypt and decrypt token verify all coming services.
(Continuous Integration) Scheduled Jenken server tasks running daily building, packaging, testing and deployment to Dev and QA environment.

responsibility.content: (Front-end) Designed the end to end flows and structures and migrated angularJS 1.7 controllers, directives, services, pipes, filters and kendo grid into Angular 6.1 components, services, UI and new Kendo grids 3.11.
(Front-end) Implemented new Angular 6 Interface, parent component, child component, services and UI based on business requirement using new kendo grid, Angular reactive forms and bootstrap.
(Front-end) Created Angular 6 Observable services layer and modals exchange data from back-end Restful APIs.

(Back-end) Implemented back-end new Restful GET, POST and PUT APIs. Created Restful controller and endpoints with JSON requests and responses with Microservices using Java, Maven, Spring framework and SpringBoot.
(Back-end) Created service layers, models and implemented business logic, validation rules and DTO layers, queries exchange data with MySQL database.
(Security) Implemented HTTP SSL web service call and JWT token generation based on public and private keys for Restful services and encrypt and decrypt token to verify coming services.
(Continuous Integration) Scheduled Jenken server tasks running daily building, packaging, testing and deployment to Dev and QA environment.
